Class MenuContainer

java.lang.Object
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.items.SlimefunItem
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block.MenuContainer

io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes.Placeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TickingMenuContainer
public abstract class MenuContainer extends io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.items.SlimefunItem
Represents a Block that has an in-built Menu.
